def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x, in get1idxs(idxs):
        check_x_medium = is_medium_size(x, ctx)
        check_x_dark = is_dark(x, ctx)
        check_x_only_black = all([is_dark(dot, ctx) for dot in ctx.get_circle(x)])
        if (
            check_x_medium
            and check_x_dark
            and check_x_only_black
        ):
            results.append([x])
    return results

def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x, in get1idxs(idxs):
        check_x_big = is_large(x, ctx)
        check_x_medium = is_medium_size(x, ctx)
        check_x_grey = is_grey(x, ctx)
        check_x_alone = all([not all_close([x,dot], ctx) for dot in idxs if dot != x])
        if (
            check_x_big
            and check_x_medium
            and check_x_grey
            and check_x_alone
        ):
            results.append([x])
    return results
state = turn(state)

def turn(state):
    # No op.
    return state
state = turn(state)

def select(state):

state = select(state)
